title: The First Heartbreak
description: The first heartbreak is the hardest.We were inseparable once.Kennedy Stratford.My small-town girl with big-city dreams.My beautiful dancer.My everything.I ruined our love to give her a chance.And it broke both of us.A lot can change in eighteen years.Yet some things stay the same.Travis Morello.A small-town cop with big-time problems.A loyal protector.A man who could still be my everything.I only have to let him in.But we won't survive a second heartbreak.
author: Amanda Bailey
